sports.name: Basketball
sports.description: Basketball is a dynamic team sport that combines agility and strategy. On the court, teams compete to score baskets, fostering teamwork and coordination. It's an excellent way to stay fit while having fun.

sports.name: Swimming
sports.description: Swimming is a full-body sport with no impact. In the water, you develop endurance and flexibility at your own pace. Perfect for overall fitness.

sports.name: Tennis
sports.description: Tennis is a racquet sport that requires precision and responsiveness. Whether played in singles or doubles, it develops reflexes and physical fitness. A great choice for those who enjoy technical challenges.

sports.name: Soccer
sports.description: The most popular sport in the world! Soccer combines running, technique, and teamwork. On the field, you develop coordination and endurance while sharing intense moments with teammates.

sports.name: Yoga
sports.description: Yoga is a mind-body practice that enhances strength, flexibility, and balance. Through various poses, you develop body awareness and serenity. Ideal for stress reduction.

sports.name: Climbing
sports.description: Climbing combines physical and mental strength. Each route is a new puzzle to solve, developing strength, flexibility, and problem-solving skills.

sports.name: Boxing
sports.description: Boxing is a complete combat sport that develops strength, speed, and endurance. In addition to physical benefits, it builds self-confidence and discipline.

sports.name: Volleyball
sports.description: A non-contact team sport, volleyball enhances explosiveness and coordination. Quick exchanges and team play make it a dynamic and social activity.

sports.name: Cycling
sports.description: Cycling offers freedom and exploration. Whether on the road or in the mountains, it improves endurance and leg strength while enjoying the outdoors.

sports.name: Martial Arts
sports.description: Martial arts combine technique, discipline, and personal development. Through various techniques, you progress physically and mentally.

sports.name: Golf
sports.description: Golf is a precision sport that requires focus and technique. On the course, you combine skill and strategy in a peaceful natural setting.

sports.name: Running
sports.description: Simple and accessible, running is excellent for cardiovascular health. You can practice anytime, anywhere, at your own pace.

sports.name: CrossFit
sports.description: CrossFit combines various functional movements at high intensity. The varied workouts develop strength, endurance, and agility comprehensively.

sports.name: Table Tennis
sports.description: A fast and technical racquet sport, table tennis enhances reflexes and coordination. The dynamic exchanges make it a fun and intense activity.

sports.name: Surfing
sports.description: Surfing offers thrills and a connection with nature. On the waves, you develop balance and environmental awareness in a unique setting.

sports.name: Dance
sports.description: Dance combines artistic expression and physical exercise. Through various styles, you develop coordination, flexibility, and rhythm.

sports.name: Rugby
sports.description: A high-intensity team sport, rugby fosters teamwork and resilience. On the field, collective strategy and physical commitment are essential.

sports.name: Pilates
sports.description: Pilates gently strengthens the deep muscles. The controlled exercises improve posture and flexibility, perfect for daily well-being.

sports.name: Ice Hockey
sports.description: A fast and technical sport, ice hockey combines skating and puck handling. Team spirit and quick actions make it an exciting sport.

sports.name: Archery
sports.description: A precision sport, archery enhances concentration and self-control. Each shot is an exercise in patience and technique.
